title: I Gave Birth to A Villain’s Child - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Arranged Marriage   Childcare   Depression   Family   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles
author: 하라쇼
description: Ami is a result of a one-night miscalculation. Karine got pregnant while her father was trying to use her in a political marriage, which led both her and her child to be ostracized by her noble family.>
